mapper.select: select id, insideCode, nor_num, inactive_num, close_num, abnor_num, nor_foreign_num, close_foreign_num, abnor_foreign_num, org_num, gran_inuse_total, gran_cloes_total, gran_abnor_total, gran_inact_total, gran_nor_max, gran_close_max, gran_abnor_max, gran_inact_max, gran_nor_min, gran_close_min, gran_abnor_min, gran_inact_min, use_nor_max, use_close_max, use_nor_for_max, use_close_for_max, overdue_total_times, overdue_max_times, overdue_180_max, overdue_180_total, ear_his_time, ear_inuse_time from zh_creditcard where insideCode = #{insideCode}
